game.name: Ellie Fab Selfie
game.description:
Many girls want to become a hairstylist in the near future. Are you also among those girls who love carrying the latest hairstyle? Hey ladies! We have got you covered with a brand new girls game where you have to give a girl a cute braided hairstyle of your choice. Does not it sound pretty interesting and a little bit engaging? Join Perfect Popular Braids and be prepared to learn about the four widely used braided hairstyles! The controls are easy to understand and graphics are cool to enjoy. 

When you click the play button, you would have to choose any one out of the four famous braided hairstyles. After choosing, make sure to give her a nice comb, a hairpin and other useful hair tools. Then you choose a nice hair color for your girl and decorate hair with a red rose flower, white flower or a brown color half moon shaped with white flower headband. You can also set it headband at your desired angle. Complete all the steps of her hair-cutting routine in this HTML5 make-up game! 

Begin the braid hair-styling process with a relaxed mind since it can be handled by anyone else! Choose your favorite braid and get ready to explore how to style your desired braid hair styles in a chic updo! We invite you to explore other popular titles from the cute braids hair games for girls and get a chance to have fun in a beautifully-designed gaming environment. The best part is that all our girls games are free of cost and playable on multiple devices, no download required.
